definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The throne of limestone was hoed by the farmers on canoe.
sentences.chinese: 石灰王座被獨木船上之農民鋤壞了。

sentences.english: I took a wooden boat from Chongqing to Hankou.
sentences.chinese: 從重慶到漢口，我坐了木船。

sentences.english: When junks want to pass this shoal, they have to ask a local man to pilot them.
sentences.chinese: 每隻木船要想渡過青灘，都得請這兒的人引領過去。

sentences.english: In the past, wooden boats were always made by hand.
sentences.chinese: 在過去，木船一向是手工打造的。

sentences.english: The visitors were transported to the Summer Palace by a wooden boat.
sentences.chinese: 遊客們坐着木船被送到了頤和園。

sentences.english: On one occasion, I and good friend Zhang Xinyi are happily playing a small wooden boat.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我和好朋友張心怡正興致勃勃地玩着小木船。

sentences.english: What direction is the acceleration of the canoe ?
sentences.chinese: 獨木船的加速度方向如何？

sentences.english: Nearby were two canoes in which they had came to the island.
sentences.chinese: 附近有兩隻他們來這個島坐的獨木船。

sentences.english: However, my most cherished is a small wooden boat.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我最珍愛的卻是一隻小木船。

sentences.english: She is very skilled at a pole, a small wooden boat on her with a coordination.
sentences.chinese: 她很嫺熟地點着篙，小木船對她的配合很協調。

sentences.english: Local fishermen in wooden boats with mounted motors.
sentences.chinese: 當地漁民開着裝有固定馬達的木船。

sentences.english: The first ironclads were wooden ships plated with iron.
sentences.chinese: 首批裝甲艦是包着鋼板的木船。

sentences.english: They pulled up the boat out of the river.
sentences.chinese: 他們把那隻木船從河裏拖了上來。

definition: fishing boat/same as 漁船|渔船
